QuestData.Title: Ishaal's Almanac
QuestData.Description: This mysterious tome was on Talonpriest Ishaal's body. It contains arcane symbols and charts of celestial bodies beyond your comprehension.$B$BAll writing is in a language you don't understand; likely an ancient version of the arakkoa written tongue. Perhaps you should bring this to Sky Commander Adaris.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Ishaal's Almanac to Sky Commander Adaris north of Skettis.
QuestData.RewardText: What have you brought to me? I can't make out the writing on this tome, $n... my loss of blood... must've blurred my vision.
